name: flannel
description: Management interface for Chainlink oracle contract

scripts.start: npm run truffle:migrate-ganache && npm run truffle:init-setup
scripts.truffle:init-setup: npm run truffle:contract-prep && npm run remix
scripts.truffle:migrate-ganache: cd ./truffle/ && npx truffle migrate --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:contract-prep: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/contract-prep.js --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:test: cd ./truffle/ && npx truffle test --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.react: npm run truffle:migrate-ganache && npm run react:react-prep
scripts.react:react-prep: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/react-prep.js --network ganache && npm run react:start-server

author: Chris Hill
